span.a: Daily Video Updates and Home Instruction Parent Resources — Click Here

div.class: fusion-alert alert custom alert-custom fusion-alert-center fusion-alert-capitalize alert-dismissable

span.span: Next week April 20-24 is school vacation week. There will be no educational expectations during this week for students. Meals will be served at all of the sites on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday only.

fusion-alert alert custom alert-custom fusion-alert-center fusion-alert-capitalize alert-dismissable

span.span: The parish of St. Rose of Lima will be offering takeout meals on Fridays from 4:30 to 5:30 PM at the parish hall on Church Street in Jay. There is also a Blessing Box outside of the parish hall that we are keeping stocked with nonperishable food that is available to anyone in the community.

ul.li: To ensure success through personalized learning.
Spruce Mountain School District is committed to providing all individuals with quality educational experiences in an academically, physically, socially and emotionally safe setting.
We will foster independent thinkers who take ownership and accountability of their learning.
We will build a partnership with families and the community to carry out our shared responsibility for education.
We will promote responsibility, respect, empathy and compassion throughout our schools and greater community.
